scripts.build:client: npm run front:dist && npm run front:less && npm run front:browserify:dev
scripts.front:dist: mkdir -p client/dist && rsync -aP --delete --exclude 'less' --exclude css/style.min.css --exclude 'js' client/src/ client/dist/
scripts.front:less: lessc client/src/less/style.less client/dist/css/style.min.css --autoprefix='> 1%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR'  --clean-css='--s1 --compatibility=ie8'
scripts.front:browserify:dev: rm -rf client/dist/js && mkdir -p client/dist/js && browserify client/src/js/app.js --verbose --debug --outfile client/dist/js/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run build:client && browser-sync start --config bs-config.js
